commands.title: AI Events: Generate & Open Report
args: source .venv/bin/activate 2>/dev/null || true; ai-events fetch && ai-events report && open dist/report.html
commands.description: Fetch latest AI events, generate HTML report, and open in browser

commands.title: AI Events: Fetch Data Only
commands.description: Fetch and update AI events data without generating report

commands.title: AI Events: List Priority Events
commands.description: List high-priority AI events marked as 'go'
